verses.verse: Of Moab <S%H4124><s%>. Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto Nebo <S%H5015><s%>! for it is laid waste <S%H7703><s%>; Kiriathaim <S%H7156><s%> is put to shame <S%H3001><s%>, it is taken <S%H3920><s%>; Misgab <S%H4869><s%> is put to shame <S%H3001><s%> and broken down <S%H2865><s%>.

The praise <S%H8416><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> is no more <S%H2809><s%>; in Heshbon they have devised <S%H2803><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> against her <S%H3212><s%>: Come, and let us cut her off <S%H3772><s%> from being a nation <S%H1471><s%>. Thou also <S%H4086><s%>, O Madmen, shalt be brought <S%H1826><s%> to silence <S%H2719><s%>: the sword shall pursue <S%H3212><s%> thee <S%H310><s%>.
The sound <S%H6963><s%> of a cry <S%H6963><s%> from Horonaim <S%H2773><s%>, desolation <S%H7701><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%> destruction <S%H7701><s%>!
Moab <S%H4124><s%> is destroyed <S%H7665><s%>; her little ones <S%H6810><s%> have caused a cry <S%H2201><s%> to be heard <S%H8085><s%>.

For by the ascent <S%H4608><s%> of Luhith <S%H3872><s%> with continual <S%H1065><s%> weeping <S%H1065><s%> shall they go up <S%H5927><s%>; for at the descent <S%H4174><s%> of Horonaim <S%H2773><s%> they <S%H6862><s%> have heard <S%H8085><s%> the distress of the cry <S%H6818><s%> of destruction <S%H7667><s%>.
Flee <S%H5127><s%>, save <S%H4422><s%> your lives <S%H5315><s%>, and be <S%H1961><s%> like the heath <S%H6176><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

For <S%H982><s%>, because thou hast trusted in thy works <S%H4639><s%> and in thy treasures <S%H214><s%>, thou also shalt be taken <S%H3920><s%>: and Chemosh <S%H3645><s%> shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> into captivity <S%H1473><s%>, his priests <S%H3548><s%> and his princes <S%H8269><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>.

And the destroyer <S%H7703><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> upon every city <S%H5892><s%>, and no city <S%H5892><s%> shall escape <S%H4422><s%>; the valley <S%H6010><s%> also shall perish <S%H6><s%>, and the plain <S%H4334><s%> shall be destroyed <S%H8045><s%>; as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken <S%H559><s%>.

Give <S%H5414><s%> wings <S%H6731><s%> unto Moab <S%H4124><s%>, that she may fly <S%H5323><s%> and get her away <S%H3318><s%>: and her cities <S%H5892><s%> shall become a desolation <S%H8047><s%>, without any to dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein <S%H2004><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that doeth <S%H6213><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> negligently <S%H7423><s%>; and cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that keepeth back <S%H4513><s%> his sword <S%H2719><s%> from blood <S%H1818><s%>.

Moab <S%H4124><s%> hath been at ease <S%H7599><s%> from his youth <S%H5271><s%>, and he hath settled <S%H8252><s%> on his lees <S%H8105><s%>, and hath not been emptied <S%H7324><s%> from vessel <S%H3627><s%> to vessel <S%H3627><s%>, neither hath he gone <S%H1980><s%> into captivity <S%H1473><s%>: therefore his taste <S%H2940><s%> remaineth <S%H5975><s%> in him <S%H7381><s%>, and his scent is not changed <S%H4171><s%>.

Therefore <S%H3117><s%>, behold, the days come <S%H935><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, that I will send <S%H7971><s%> unto him them that pour <S%H6808><s%> off <S%H6808><s%>, and they shall pour him off <S%H7324><s%>; and they shall empty his vessels <S%H3627><s%>, and break <S%H5310><s%> their bottles in pieces <S%H5035><s%>.

And Moab <S%H4124><s%> shall be ashamed <S%H954><s%> of Chemosh <S%H3645><s%>, as the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> was ashamed <S%H954><s%> of Beth-el <S%H1008><s%> their confidence <S%H4009><s%>.
How say <S%H559><s%> ye <S%H1368><s%>, We are mighty men <S%H2428><s%>, and valiant men <S%H582><s%> for the war <S%H4421><s%>?

Moab <S%H4124><s%> is laid waste <S%H7703><s%>, and they are gone up <S%H5927><s%> into his cities <S%H5892><s%>, and his chosen <S%H4005><s%> young men <S%H970><s%> are gone down <S%H3381><s%> to the slaughter <S%H2874><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the King <S%H4428><s%>, whose name <S%H8034><s%> is Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.
The calamity <S%H343><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> to come <S%H935><s%>, and his affliction <S%H7451><s%> hasteth <S%H4116><s%> fast <S%H3966><s%>.

All ye that are round about <S%H5439><s%> him <S%H5110><s%>, bemoan him <S%H3045><s%>, and all ye that know his name <S%H8034><s%>; say <S%H559><s%>, How is the strong <S%H5797><s%> staff <S%H4294><s%> broken <S%H7665><s%>, the beautiful <S%H8597><s%> rod <S%H4731><s%>!

O thou daughter <S%H1323><s%> that dwellest <S%H3427><s%> in Dibon <S%H1769><s%>, come down <S%H3381><s%> from thy glory <S%H3519><s%>, and sit <S%H3427><s%> in thirst <S%H6772><s%>; for the destroyer <S%H7703><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> is come <S%H5927><s%> up against thee <S%H7843><s%>, he hath destroyed thy strongholds <S%H4013><s%>.

O inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Aroer <S%H6177><s%>, stand <S%H5975><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%>, and watch <S%H6822><s%>: ask <S%H7592><s%> him that fleeth <S%H5127><s%>, and her that escapeth <S%H4422><s%>; say <S%H559><s%>, What hath been done <S%H1961><s%>?

Moab <S%H4124><s%> is put to shame <S%H3001><s%>; for it is broken down <S%H2865><s%>: wail <S%H3213><s%> and cry <S%H2199><s%>; tell <S%H5046><s%> ye it by the Arnon <S%H769><s%>, that Moab <S%H4124><s%> is laid waste <S%H7703><s%>.
And judgment <S%H4941><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> upon the plain <S%H4334><s%> country <S%H776><s%>, upon Holon <S%H2473><s%>, and upon Jahzah <S%H3096><s%>, and upon Mephaath <S%H4158><s%>,
and upon Dibon <S%H1769><s%>, and upon Nebo <S%H5015><s%>, and upon Beth-diblathaim <S%H1015><s%>,
and upon Kiriathaim <S%H7156><s%>, and upon Beth-gamul <S%H1014><s%>, and upon Beth-meon <S%H1010><s%>,
and upon Kerioth <S%H7152><s%>, and upon Bozrah <S%H1224><s%>, and upon all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, far <S%H7350><s%> or near <S%H7138><s%>.
The horn <S%H7161><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> is cut off <S%H1438><s%>, and his arm <S%H2220><s%> is broken <S%H7665><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Make ye him drunken <S%H7937><s%>; for he magnified <S%H1431><s%> himself against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: and Moab <S%H4124><s%> shall wallow <S%H5606><s%> in his vomit <S%H6892><s%>, and he also shall be in derision <S%H7814><s%>.

For was not Israel <S%H3478><s%> a derision <S%H7814><s%> unto thee <S%H4672><s%>? was he found among thieves <S%H1590><s%>? for as often <S%H1767><s%> as thou speakest <S%H1697><s%> of him <S%H5110><s%>, thou waggest the head.

O ye inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, leave <S%H5800><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%>, and dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the rock <S%H5553><s%>; and be like the dove <S%H3123><s%> that maketh her nest <S%H7077><s%> over <S%H5676><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the abyss <S%H6354><s%>.

We have heard <S%H8085><s%> of the pride <S%H1347><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, that he is very <S%H3966><s%> proud <S%H1343><s%>; his loftiness <S%H1363><s%>, and his pride <S%H1347><s%>, and his arrogancy <S%H1346><s%>, and the haughtiness <S%H7312><s%> of his heart <S%H3820><s%>.
I know <S%H3045><s%> his wrath <S%H5678><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, that it is nought <S%H907><s%>; his boastings have wrought nothing <S%H6213><s%>.

Therefore will I wail <S%H3213><s%> for Moab <S%H4124><s%>; yea <S%H2199><s%>, I will cry out for all Moab <S%H4124><s%>: for the men <S%H582><s%> of Kir-heres <S%H7025><s%> shall they mourn <S%H1897><s%>.

With more than the weeping <S%H1065><s%> of Jazer <S%H3270><s%> will I weep <S%H1058><s%> for thee <S%H1612><s%>, O vine of Sibmah <S%H7643><s%>: thy branches <S%H5189><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%>, they reached <S%H5060><s%> even to the sea <S%H3220><s%> of Jazer <S%H3270><s%>: upon thy summer fruits <S%H7019><s%> and upon thy vintage <S%H1210><s%> the destroyer <S%H7703><s%> is fallen <S%H5307><s%>.

And gladness <S%H1524><s%> and joy <S%H8057><s%> is taken <S%H622><s%> away from the fruitful field <S%H3759><s%> and from the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>; and I have caused wine <S%H3196><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%> from the winepresses <S%H3342><s%>: none shall tread <S%H1869><s%> with shouting <S%H1959><s%>; the shouting <S%H1959><s%> shall be no shouting <S%H1959><s%>.

From the cry <S%H2201><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> even unto Elealeh <S%H500><s%>, even unto Jahaz <S%H3096><s%> have they uttered <S%H5414><s%> their voice <S%H6963><s%>, from Zoar <S%H6820><s%> even unto Horonaim <S%H2773><s%>, to Eglath <S%H5697><s%> - shelishiyah <S%H7992><s%>: for the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Nimrim <S%H5249><s%> also shall become desolate <S%H4923><s%>.

Moreover I will cause to cease <S%H7673><s%> in Moab <S%H4124><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, him that offereth <S%H5927><s%> in the high place <S%H1116><s%>, and him that burneth incense <S%H6999><s%> to his gods <S%H430><s%>.

Therefore my heart <S%H3820><s%> soundeth <S%H1993><s%> for Moab <S%H4124><s%> like pipes <S%H2485><s%>, and my heart <S%H3820><s%> soundeth <S%H1993><s%> like pipes <S%H2485><s%> for the men <S%H582><s%> of Kir-heres <S%H7025><s%>: therefore the abundance <S%H3502><s%> that he hath gotten <S%H6213><s%> is perished <S%H6><s%>.

For every head <S%H7218><s%> is bald <S%H7144><s%>, and every beard <S%H2206><s%> clipped <S%H1639><s%>: upon all the hands <S%H3027><s%> are cuttings <S%H1417><s%>, and upon the loins <S%H4975><s%> sackcloth <S%H8242><s%>.

On all the housetops <S%H1406><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> and in the streets <S%H7339><s%> thereof there is lamentation <S%H4553><s%> every where <S%H7665><s%>; for I have broken Moab <S%H4124><s%> like a vessel <S%H3627><s%> wherein none delighteth <S%H2656><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

How is it broken down <S%H2865><s%>! how do they wail <S%H3213><s%>! how hath Moab <S%H4124><s%> turned <S%H6437><s%> the back <S%H6203><s%> with shame <S%H954><s%>! so shall Moab <S%H4124><s%> become a derision <S%H7814><s%> and a terror <S%H4288><s%> to all that are round about him <S%H5439><s%>.
For thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: Behold <S%H1675><s%>, he shall fly as an eagle <S%H5404><s%>, and shall spread <S%H6566><s%> out his wings <S%H3671><s%> against Moab <S%H4124><s%>.

Kerioth <S%H7152><s%> is taken <S%H3920><s%>, and the strongholds <S%H4679><s%> are seized <S%H3920><s%>, and the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> at that day <S%H3117><s%> shall be as the heart <S%H3820><s%> of a woman <S%H802><s%> in her pangs <S%H6887><s%>.
And Moab <S%H4124><s%> shall be destroyed <S%H8045><s%> from being a people <S%H5971><s%>, because he hath magnified <S%H1431><s%> himself against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Fear <S%H6343><s%>, and the pit <S%H6354><s%>, and the snare <S%H6341><s%>, are upon thee <S%H3427><s%>, O inhabitant of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

He that fleeth <S%H5127><s%> from <S%H6440><s%> the fear <S%H6343><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> into the pit <S%H6354><s%>; and he that getteth up <S%H5927><s%> out of the pit <S%H6354><s%> shall be taken <S%H3920><s%> in the snare <S%H6341><s%>: for I will bring <S%H935><s%> upon him <S%H4124><s%>, even upon Moab, the year <S%H8141><s%> of their visitation <S%H6486><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

They that fled <S%H5127><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> without strength <S%H3581><s%> under the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>; for a fire <S%H784><s%> is gone forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, and a flame <S%H3852><s%> from the midst <S%H996><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%>, and hath devoured <S%H398><s%> the corner <S%H6285><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, and the crown of the head <S%H6936><s%> of the tumultuous <S%H7588><s%> ones <S%H1121><s%>.

Woe <S%H188><s%> unto thee <S%H4124><s%>, O Moab! the people <S%H5971><s%> of Chemosh <S%H3645><s%> is undone <S%H6><s%>; for thy sons <S%H1121><s%> are taken <S%H3947><s%> away captive <S%H7628><s%>, and thy daughters <S%H1323><s%> into captivity <S%H7633><s%>.

Yet will I bring back <S%H7725><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> in the latter <S%H319><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>. Thus far <S%H2008><s%> is the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>.
